Name: Galactic Lords
About the game: Experimental indie strategy game. Lead the group of Galactic Lords through 7 levels to discover the origin of a world-wide menace! Features: - Combined gameplay: turn-based map and real-time units combat. - Elemental weakness system: Ice > Fire > Wood > Elec > Ice - 6 playable Galactic Lords. - 7 levels themed with different elements. - Game save/load.
